name: pager-backend
description: Backend services for an AI-powered, privacy-first team collaboration platform. Manages secure data, AI processing, and real-time communication to give you full control over your competitive edge.
author: HeroTools

scripts.setup:local: cp config/parameters.example.json config/parameters.json && echo 'âœ… Edit config/parameters.json with your values'
scripts.local:dev: npm run generate:env dev && npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --env-vars env.json --config-env dev --region us-east-2 --profile unowned-prod
scripts.local:prod: npm run generate:env prod && npm run build && sam local start-api -p 8081 --env-vars env.json --config-env prod --region us-east-2 --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev:setup: npm run generate:env dev && npm run setup:aws dev && npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:dev:force: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod --parameter-overrides DeploymentVersion=$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:dev:version: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env dev --profile unowned-prod --parameter-overrides DeploymentVersion=${npm_config_version:-$(date +%s)}
scripts.deploy:prod:setup: npm run generate:env prod && npm run setup:aws prod && npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod
scripts.deploy:prod:force: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod --parameter-overrides DeploymentVersion=$(date +%s)
scripts.deploy:prod:version: npm run build && sam deploy --config-env prod --profile unowned-prod --parameter-overrides DeploymentVersion=${npm_config_version:-$(date +%s)}
scripts.webhooks:deploy:dev: cd webhooks && sam build && sam deploy --config-env dev --parameter-overrides EnableNotifications=true
scripts.webhooks:deploy:dev:setup: cd webhooks && sam build && sam deploy --config-env dev --parameter-overrides EnableNotifications=false
scripts.webhooks:deploy:prod: cd webhooks && sam build && sam deploy --config-env prod --parameter-overrides EnableNotifications=true Environment=prod StackName=pager-webhooks-prod MainStackName=unowned
scripts.webhooks:deploy:prod:setup: cd webhooks && sam build && sam deploy --config-env prod --parameter-overrides EnableNotifications=false Environment=prod StackName=pager-webhooks-prod MainStackName=unowned
